actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to ensure that airline computer reservation systems are available to users on a nondiscriminatory basis, and for other purposes.
short_title: Airline Computer Reservation System Availability Act of 1991

summary.text: Airline Computer Reservation System Availability Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Secretary of Transportation to ensure that computer reservation systems are available to all air carriers, ticket agents, and other persons on a nondiscriminatory basis. Prohibits air carriers (or affiliates) from operating such a system after January 1, 1992.

titles.title: Airline Computer Reservation System Availability Act of 1991
A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to ensure that airline computer reservation systems are available to users on a nondiscriminatory basis, and for other purposes.
